title: Behavior therapists emphasize which in treatment

content.question: Behavior therapists emphasize which of the following in their treatment of clients?

choices.label: Freedom of choice about the future
The uncovering of unconscious defense mechanisms
Responses that have been reinforced in the past

content.answer: Responses that have been reinforced in the past

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
